title: Orthopedic Examination App
description:
Orthopedic Examination App - Your Ultimate Guide to Clinical Orthopedic Examination & Special Tests!

For orthopedic surgery residents and specialists who want to learn and master the special tests in orthopedic surgery, this app is a must-have. Our Orthopedic Examination & Special Tests app contains a comprehensive list of all the special tests you need for shoulder, elbow, wrist, hand, hip, knee, ankle, foot and spine clinical examinations.

Our Orthopedic Examination is designed to make your orthopedic education easier. It's categorized into multiple sections based on the region and type of examination, making it easy for you to navigate and find the test you need.

Our app includes the following special tests:
1. Shoulder Examination
2. Elbow Examination
3. Wrist & Hand Examination
4. Hip Examination
5. Knee Examination
6. Ankle & Foot Examination
7. Spine Examination

Each test page is packed with information, including:
- Purpose of the test
- How the test is performed
- When it's considered positive
- Sensitivity & specificity
- Source of the test
- Image of the test
- Video explaining the test (from YouTube)

We'll be continuously updating our app by adding new special tests and improving its functionality.

Paid features include:
- Multilingual app: English, Germany and Spanish.
- Changing font sise and family
- Ads Free Experience
- MCQs Test for Special Tests: Test Your Knowledge in Orthopedic Examination
- Videos: Every Special Test has an Embedded Video for You to Watch (from YouTube)
- Notes: Add Your Own Notes to the App

Download Orthopedic Examination & Special Tests App now and take your orthopedic examination skills to the next level!
